conversation.message: Hello! How can I help you today?

To improve your speaking skills, you can practice regularly by engaging in conversations with native speakers or language exchange partners, listen to English podcasts or watch movies to improve your listening skills, and review and practice specific vocabulary and phrases related to common topics.
Can you recommend any English podcasts or YouTube channels that are helpful for improving speaking skills?
Answer: Certainly! Some popular English language podcasts and YouTube channels for improving speaking skills include "BBC Learning English", "EnglishClass101", and "TED Talks".
